This project is distributed with several 3rd party libraries.

1) JUnit (http://junit.org/), Eclipse Public License 1.0 (http://junit.org/license.html)
    junit-4.11.jar
    
2) snakeyaml (https://code.google.com/p/snakeyaml/), Apache License 2.0 (http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0)
    snakeyaml-1.10.jar

3) google-gson (https://code.google.com/p/google-gson/), Apache License 2.0
    gson-2.3.jar

4) Apache HttpComponents (https://hc.apache.org), Apache License 2.0
    httpclient-4.0.jar
    httpcore-4.0.1.jar
    
5) Apache Commons, Apache License 2.0
    commons-codec-1.3.jar
    commons-compress-1.8.jar

6) hamcrest (https://code.google.com/p/hamcrest/), New BSD License (http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause)
    hamcrest-core-1.3.jar
    
7) mockito (https://code.google.com/p/mockito/), MIT License (http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php)
    mockito-core-1.9.5.jar
